entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain early this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
